summary: Elseryl has lost his belongings, can you get them back? Help him and his family and be rewarded, handsomely.
descriptionHtml:
[size=28]Elseryl\\\'s Final Loss[/size]

[size=3]This is my first quest mod, well first working one, hope you guys like it.

Help Elseryl and his family get back their lost possessions, each member of the family has a serrate quest. Get their belongings and they will pay you twice the amount worth of the item.
[/size]
author: Zimose
